title: Mohsin Naqvi pays tribute to martyred hero Subhan for foiling Bannu terror attack
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 19 (APP): Federal Minister for Interior Mohsin Naqvi on Friday paid tribute to the martyred soldier Subhan, who sacrificed his life to foil a recent terrorist attack in Bannu.
Naqvi praised Subhan’s bravery, stating that his heroic act would always be remembered in history.
He emphasized that Subhan’s courage was a testament to the spirit of the nation, and due to the presence of such brave sons like him, every enemy plot was bound to fail.
it is pertinent to mention that Subhan had sacrificed his life by shielding others from a hand grenade, thereby foiling the terrorists’ malicious plans.
